fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Call an official investigation on an authorized target during the night.
- Call an official investigation on an unauthorized target during the night. 1 Use.
- Analyze the results of up to two target's investigation during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will be informed an official investigation was called on them.
- Due to the strain of having their house raided by 20 men in suits, fellow Sentries will be roleblocked the night you target them.
- When analyzing, you will gain the consigliere results of up to two chosen previous investigation target.
